channel.title: Solution to people on Server Help which needs help
channel.description: Everyone will help 1 person per day, we have over 500 people who are on daily and do some good posting, this will work as long as we all cooperate and dont troll/flame the people who need help.

Eh im not sure how you would do that but i try to help people everyday and alot of peeps add my msn and ask for help there
